title: College Management System (4-2019)
disc: This Project is created for Ashok polytechnic college to manage Students and Staff of all departments

title: Country Founder (12-2019)
disc:
On this website user can see status about India like currunt cases, state-wise status is shown in visual and table view, user can login and check their covid condition.

This includes dark mode and light mode and cool animations with responsive design

title: Country Founder (12-2019)
disc:
This project uses an API to collect details of every Country and showcase it.

This website can run on almost any device and contains two dark and light mode
